snippet: Theodore P. Wafer, 55, was found guilty of shooting Renisha McBride, 19, who banged on his front door in the middle of the night in Dearborn Heights, Mich.
abstract: Detroit jury convicts Theodore P Wafer of murdering Renisha McBride, black woman Wafer fatally shot when she banged on his front door in the middle of the night in Dearborn Heights, Mich; case stirred racial tensions in Detroit, drawing comparisons to case of Trayvon Martin.

byline.original: By MARY M. CHAPMAN and JULIE BOSMAN
byline.contributor: Mary M. Chapman reported from Detroit, and Julie Bosman from Chicago.

lead_paragraph: Theodore P. Wafer, 55, was found guilty of shooting Renisha McBride, 19, who banged on his front door in the middle of the night in Dearborn Heights, Mich.

headline.main: Detroit-Area Man Convicted of Murdering Teenager on His Porch
headline.print_headline: Man Guilty of Murdering Woman at His Front Door
